## mapVVN variable

Like [mapVV](./vectors.mapvv.md)<!-- -->, but for [VecOpVVN](./vectors.vecopvvn.md) type ops and hence using two vector input buffers `a`<!-- -->, `b` and a scalar `n`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mapVVN: (op: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn4<import("./api").Vec | null, import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, number, import("./api").Vec>, out: IVector<any>, a: IVector<any>, b: IVector<any>, n: number, num: number, so?: number, sa?: number, sb?: number) => import("./api").Vec
```
